content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining Complex at position(x=37-41, y=-83--87)
Consists of following entities:
- 4 Burner mining drills at positions (37.0,-85.0), (39.0,-85.0), (41.0,-83.0), (41.0,-86.0)
- 4 Wooden chests at positions (34.5,-86.5), (36.5,-86.5), (39.5,-83.5), (40.5,-87.5)
- 2 Burner inserters at positions (35.5,-86.5), (35.5,-85.5)
All drills are currently out of fuel but positioned over coal resources

### Iron/Copper Ore Mining at position(x=-28, y=-61)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (-28.0,-61.0) mining iron and copper ore
- Wooden chest at (-27.5,-59.5) collecting the ore
- Burner inserter at (-26.5,-59.5) moving ore to furnace
- Stone furnace at (-27.0,-58.0) for smelting
- Wooden chest at (-24.5,-58.5) collecting plates
- Additional furnaces at (-23.0,-58.0) and (-21.0,-58.0)

### Iron Mining Complex at position(x=-6 to -10, y=-57 to -60)
Consists of:
- 3 Burner mining drills at positions (-10.0,-59.0), (-8.0,-59.0), (-6.0,-59.0)
- Multiple wooden chests at (-9.5,-57.5), (-7.5,-57.5), (-5.5,-57.5)
- Transport belt system connecting components
- Multiple burner inserters managing material flow

### Smelting Line at position(x=0 to 6, y=0)
Consists of:
- 4 Stone furnaces at positions (0.0,0.0), (2.0,0.0), (4.0,0.0), (6.0,0.0)
- Input chests at (0.5,-2.5), (2.5,-2.5), (4.5,-2.5), (6.5,-2.5)
- Output chests at (0.5,2.5), (2.5,2.5), (4.5,2.5), (6.5,2.5)
- Multiple burner inserters managing input/output

### Power Generation System at position(x=-3.5 to 4.5, y=17.5 to 27.5)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at (-3.5,27.5)
- Boiler at (-1.5,22.0)
- Steam engine at (4.5,20.5)
- Pipe network connecting components
- Small electric poles creating electricity network

ERROR TIPS

### Errors when trying to extract from invalid positions
- Ensure the target position contains the resource you're trying to extract
- Verify the position coordinates are correct before attempting extraction

### Fuel management issues
- Multiple burner mining drills are out of fuel
- Ensure fuel supply lines are properly set up and maintained
- Consider automating coal delivery to mining drills

### System connectivity issues
- Steam engine shows "no input liquid" warning
- Ensure proper pipe connections between boiler and steam engine
- Verify fluid system connectivity and flow direction

### Space management issues
- Some inserters show "output blocked" warnings
- Ensure sufficient space for item placement
- Check if destination inventories have available capacity
